policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/site-nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
  name: site-nginx-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: your_domain.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: site-nginx-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: deployment6612.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: nasi101/auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

##### FILE: deployment6617.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mywebapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mywebapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: mykustom-map
        image: devopsjourney1/mywebapp:latest
        name: mycontainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 16Mi

---

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/mywebapp failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/mywebapp failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: local-kms
  namespace: vault
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: local-kms
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: local-kms
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nsmithuk/local-kms
        name: local-kms
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /init
          name: kms-seed
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: kms-seed
        secret:
          secretName: kms-seed

##### FILE: deployment6621.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prod-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: prod-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - |
          cd qrchat &&
          python manage.py makemigrations accounts chat &&
          python manage.py migrate &&
          python manage.py collectstatic --noinput &&
          python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
        env:
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          value: ${DJANGO_SECRET_KEY}
        - name: REDIS_HOST_IP
          value: ${REDIS_HOST_IP}
        - name: DATABASE_NAME
          value: ${DB_NAME}
        - name: DATABASE_USER_NAME
          value: ${DB_USER_NAME}
        - name: DATABASE_USER_PASSWORD
          value: ${DB_USER_PASSWORD}
        - name: STATIC_BUCKET_NAME
          value: ${STATIC_BUCKET_NAME}
        - name: MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME
          value: ${MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME}
        - name: PROJECT_ID
          value: ${GCP_PROJECT_ID}
        - name: DOMAIN_NAME
          value: ${DNS_NAME}
        - name: DJANGO_DEBUG
          value: ${DJANGO_DEBUG_MODE}
        - name: REMOTE_DEPLOY
          value: "True"
        image: ${GCP_REGION}-docker.pkg.dev/${GCP_PROJECT_ID}/${PROJECT_NAME}-repository/django:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: django
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 30
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - |
          cd qrchat &&
          celery -A qrchat worker -l info
        env:
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          value: ${DJANGO_SECRET_KEY}
        - name: REDIS_HOST_IP
          value: ${REDIS_HOST_IP}
        - name: DATABASE_NAME
          value: ${DB_NAME}
        - name: DATABASE_USER_NAME
          value: ${DB_USER_NAME}
        - name: DATABASE_USER_PASSWORD
          value: ${DB_USER_PASSWORD}
        - name: STATIC_BUCKET_NAME
          value: ${STATIC_BUCKET_NAME}
        - name: MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME
          value: ${MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME}
        - name: PROJECT_ID
          value: ${GCP_PROJECT_ID}
        - name: DOMAIN_NAME
          value: ${DNS_NAME}
        - name: DJANGO_DEBUG
          value: ${DJANGO_DEBUG_MODE}
        - name: REMOTE_DEPLOY
          value: "True"
        image: ${GCP_REGION}-docker.pkg.dev/${GCP_PROJECT_ID}/${PROJECT_NAME}-repository/django:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: celery
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /cloud_sql_proxy
        - --dir=/cloudsql
        - -instances=${GCP_PROJECT_ID}:${GCP_REGION}:${PROJECT_NAME}-database-instance=tcp:0.0.0.0:3306
        - -term_timeout=30s
        image: gcr.io/cloudsql-docker/gce-proxy:latest
        name: cloud-sql-proxy
        restartPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: custom-service-account

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prod-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: prod-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - |
          cd qrchat &&
          python manage.py makemigrations accounts chat &&
          python manage.py migrate &&
          python manage.py collectstatic --noinput &&
          python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
        env:
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DJANGO_SECRET
              name: django-config
        - name: REDIS_HOST_IP
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_HOST_IP
              name: django-config
        - name: DATABASE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_NAME
              name: django-config
        - name: DATABASE_USER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_USER_NAME
              name: django-config
        - name: DATABASE_USER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DATABASE_USER_PASSWORD
              name: django-config
        - name: STATIC_BUCKET_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: STATIC_BUCKET_NAME
              name: django-config
        - name: MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME
              name: django-config
        - name: PROJECT_ID
          value: ${GCP_PROJECT_ID}
        - name: DOMAIN_NAME
          value: ${DNS_NAME}
        - name: DJANGO_DEBUG
          value: ${DJANGO_DEBUG_MODE}
        - name: REMOTE_DEPLOY
          value: "True"
        image: ${GCP_REGION}-docker.pkg.dev/${GCP_PROJECT_ID}/${PROJECT_NAME}-repository/django:latest

        name: django

          protocol: TCP

            secretKeyRef:
              key: MEDIA_BUCKET_NAME

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to house-price-pred/Deployment/house-price-pred:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: house-price-pred
    env: development
  name: house-price-pred
  namespace: house-price-pred
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: house-price-pred
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: house-price-pred
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: username/house-price-pred:v1
        name: house-price-pred
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 800Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root/
          name: house-price-pred-pv
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: tz-jakarta
      volumes:
      - name: house-price-pred-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: house-price-pred-pvc
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Jakarta
        name: tz-jakarta

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: myapp-cluster
    app.kubernetes.io/name: mediagram
  name: mediagram
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: myapp-node
      app.kubernetes.io/name: mediagram
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: myapp-node
        app.kubernetes.io/name: mediagram
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RELEASE_NODE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: RELEASE_COOKIE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ERLANG_COOKIE
              name: mediagram-cluster
        image: myapp:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4369
          name: epmd
          protocol: TCP

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mailserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mailserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mailserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mailserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: mailserver-env
        image: ghcr.io/docker-mailserver/docker-mailserver:14.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mailserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 25
          name: smtp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 465
          name: submissions
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 587
          name: submission
        - containerPort: 993
          name: imaps
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 600m
            memory: 2Gi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - CHOWN
            - FOWNER
            - MKNOD
            - SETGID
            - SETUID
            - DAC_OVERRIDE
            - NET_ADMIN
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            - SYS_CHROOT
            - KILL
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 0
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 0
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/docker-mailserver/postfix-accounts.cf
          name: files
          readOnly: true
          subPath: postfix-accounts.cf
        - mountPath: /var/mail
          name: data
          readOnly: false
          subPath: data
        - mountPath: /var/mail-state
          name: data
          readOnly: false
          subPath: state
        - mountPath: /var/log/mail
          name: data
          readOnly: false
          subPath: log
        - mountPath: /secrets/ssl/rsa/
          name: certificates-rsa
          readOnly: true
      hostname: mail
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mailserver-files
        name: files
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mailserver-data
      - name: certificates-rsa
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          secretName: mail-tls-certificate-rsa

---

##### FILE: deployment6657.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/webserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: webserver
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webserver
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: webserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: nginx-logs
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - image: netdata/netdata:v1.29.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: netdata
        ports:
        - containerPort: 19999
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: nginx-logs
        - mountPath: /etc/netdata/netdata.conf
          name: netdata-config
          subPath: netdata.conf
        - mountPath: /var/lib/netdata
          name: netdata-writable
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_SERVER
          value: http://127.0.0.1:80/stub_status
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: nginx-logs
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config
      - configMap:
          name: netdata-config
        name: netdata-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: netdata-writable

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    worker_processes 1;
    events { worker_connections 1024; }
    http {
        access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log;
        sendfile on;
        tcp_nopush on;
        tcp_nodelay on;
        keepalive_timeout 65;
        types_hash_max_size 2048;
        include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type application/octet-stream;
        server {
          listen 80;
          server_name localhost;
          location /stub_status {
            stub_status on;
            access_log off;
          }
          location / {
            root /usr/share/nginx/html;
            index index.html index.htm;
          }
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: monitoring

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/ConfigMap/prometheus-server-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  prometheus.yml: |
    global:
      scrape_interval: 15s
      evaluation_interval: 15s
    scrape_configs:
      - job_name: 'prometheus'
        static_configs:
          - targets: ['localhost:9090']

      # Netdata for live storage
      - job_name: "netdata"
        scrape_interval: 10s
        scrape_timeout: 10s
        metrics_path: /api/v1/allmetrics
        params:
          format: ['prometheus']
        scheme: http
        kubernetes_sd_configs:
          - role: pod
        relabel_configs:
          - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_label_app]
            action: keep
            regex: webserver
          - source_labels: [__address__]
            target_label: __address__
            replacement: netdata-service.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:19999
    remote_write:
      # Remote write for live storage (Netdata)
      - url: http://vminsert-live.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:8480/insert/0/prometheus
        queue_config:
          capacity: 10000
          max_shards: 5
        write_relabel_configs:
          - source_labels: [__name__]
            regex: "netdata.*"
            action: keep

      # Remote write for longterm storage (Prometheus)
      - url: http://vminsert-longterm.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:8480/insert/0/prometheus
        queue_config:
          capacity: 10000
          max_shards: 5
        write_relabel_configs:
          - source_labels: [__name__]
            regex: "prometheus.*"
            action: keep
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: prometheus-server-conf
  namespace: monitoring

kind: Deployment
metadata:

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kmj951015/tail-passengers_frontend:1.0.1
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/dist
          name: dist
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: dist
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dist

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - sh
        - -c
        - python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py
          loaddata test_user.json && daphne -b 0.0.0.0 -p 443 back.asgi:application
        env:
        - name: BASE_IP
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BASE_IP
              name: env
        - name: DJANGO_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DJANGO_SECRET_KEY
              name: env
        - name: POSTGRES_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_NAME
              name: env
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: env
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: env
        image: kmj951015/tail-passengers_web:1.0.1
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always

    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTPS
  name: helpdesk-ingress-https
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: api.helpdesk.127.0.0.1.nip.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: helpdesk-api
            port:
              number: 443
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: app.helpdesk.127.0.0.1.nip.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: helpdesk-web
            port:
              number: 443
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - api.helpdesk.127.0.0.1.nip.io
    - app.helpdesk.127.0.0.1.nip.io
    secretName: tls-secret

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helpdesk-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: helpdesk-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helpdesk-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helpdesk-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Development
        - name: ASPNETCORE_URLS
          value: https://+:443;http://+:80
        - name: ASPNETCORE_Kestrel__Certificates__Default__Password
          value: helpdesk
        - name: ASPNETCORE_Kestrel__Certificates__Default__Path
          value: /root/.aspnet/https/helpdesk.pfx
        - name: ConnectionStrings__HelpDeskDb
          value: Server=helpdesk-db,1433;Database=HelpDeskDb;User=sa;Password=yourStrong(!)Password;Encrypt=False;
        - name: Jwt__Issuer
          value: https://helpdesk-api/
        - name: Jwt__Audience
          value: https://helpdesk-api/
        - name: Jwt__Security
          value: WvvWzuqwJ5DvDGaRRVnKCuL2k35aEhiY0qoKR7qj0gVn3f6PxwPnhbB2VPp82gLH
        - name: Jwt__TokenExpirationInMinutes
          value: "60"
        image: bfecchio/helpdesk-apiservice-api:latest
        name: helpdesk-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root/.aspnet/https
          name: pfx-volume
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: pfx-volume
        secret:
          items:
          - key: helpdesk.pfx
            path: helpdesk.pfx
          secretName: pfx-secret

          value: https://helpdesk-api/

          value: "60"

          value: https://helpdesk-api/

          value: HelpDeskApi.Token
        - name: ExternalService__RequestTimeoutInSeconds
          value: "120"

          value: https://api.helpdesk.127.0.0.1.nip.io/swagger/index.html
        - name: Cluster__ProjectUrl
          value: https://github.com/fiap-2nett/tc-fase5-kubernetes
        - name: Cluster__WikiUrl
          value: https://github.com/fiap-2nett/tc-fase4-clean-architecture/wiki
        - name: Cluster__LogsUrl
          value: http://logs.helpdesk.127.0.0.1.nip.io

        ports:
        - containerPort: 443

          name: pfx-volume

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app: pod-info
  name: pod-info-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-info
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-info
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: kimschles/pod-info-app:latest
        name: pod-info-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

          protocol: TCP

##### FILE: deployment6703.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: postgres
  name: postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: postgres-secret
        image: postgres:15.3-alpine
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-storage
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 70
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment6704.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: redis
  name: redis
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: redis
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: redis:latest
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: redis-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: redis-data

---

##### FILE: deployment6705.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-lookout:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kube-lookout
  name: kube-lookout
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kube-lookout
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kube-lookout
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SLACK_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SLACK_TOKEN
              name: slack-secrets
        - name: SLACK_CHANNEL_DEGRADED
          value: '#degraded'
        - name: SLACK_CHANNEL_ROLLOUT
          value: '#rollouts'
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          value: Kubernetes Cluster
        image: bnay14/kube-notify:2.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kube-lookout
      serviceAccount: kube-lookout

---

##### FILE: Deployment672.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/alertmanager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: alertmanager
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alertmanager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: alertmanager
      name: alertmanager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/alertmanager/config.yml
        - --storage.path=/alertmanager
        image: prom/alertmanager:latest
        name: alertmanager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9093
          name: alertmanager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/alertmanager
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/alertmanager-templates
          name: templates-volume
        - mountPath: /alertmanager
          name: alertmanager
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: alertmanager-config
        name: config-volume
      - configMap:
          name: alertmanager-templates
        name: templates-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: alertmanager

---

##### FILE: deployment6729.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

  replicas: 3

      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)

        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting

        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map

        name: the-container

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: demo-namespace

    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP

    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: explore-california
  name: explore-california
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: explore-california
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: explore-california
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: azax1234/explore-california:4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: explore-california-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: deployment6767_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 3
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass-tmbk2k5m9f
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass-tmbk2k5m9f
        image: mysql:8.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql

---

##### FILE: deployment677.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vizier-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: vizier-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: vizier-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: vizier-operator
        plane: control
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: Exists
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: beta.kubernetes.io/os
                operator: Exists
              - key: beta.kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - image: operator-operator_image:latest
        name: app
      serviceAccountName: pixie-operator-service-account

---

##### FILE: deployment678.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/unused:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: unused
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64

---

##### FILE: deployment679.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/slackin-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: slackin-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: slackin-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: slackin-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RECAPTCHA_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RECAPTCHA_SECRET
              name: slackin-secrets
        - name: SLACK_API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SLACK_API_TOKEN
              name: slackin-secrets
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: slackin-config
        image: ghcr.io/pixie-io/slackin:0.1.0@sha256:6811d908c353b4bacb3108d853e60e7b98149a7f6e71c110c2d212e58632271b
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 58000
            scheme: HTTP
        name: slackin-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 58000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 58000
            scheme: HTTP

---

##### FILE: deployment6798.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-opentelemetry-collector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.103.1
    helm.sh/chart: opentelemetry-collector-0.95.0
  name: example-opentelemetry-collector
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
      app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
      component: standalone-collector
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        checksum/config: bb4af2ad47c592ddef5d5446eaf4e8fbfc6d3e5a30aa5469118e45caaa3d0d44
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
        app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
        component: standalone-collector
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/conf/relay.yaml
        command:
        - /otelcol-k8s
        env:
        - name: MY_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          value: 152MiB
        image: otel/opentelemetry-collector-k8s:0.103.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 13133
        name: opentelemetry-collector
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6831
          name: jaeger-compact
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 14250
          name: jaeger-grpc
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 14268
          name: jaeger-thrift
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 4317
          name: otlp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 4318
          name: otlp-http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9411
          name: zipkin
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 13133
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200M
        securityContext: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /conf
          name: opentelemetry-collector-configmap
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: example-opentelemetry-collector
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: relay
            path: relay.yaml
          name: example-opentelemetry-collector
        name: opentelemetry-collector-configmap

---

##### FILE: deployment6799.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-opentelemetry-collector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.103.1
    helm.sh/chart: opentelemetry-collector-0.95.0
  name: example-opentelemetry-collector
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
      app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
      component: standalone-collector
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        checksum/config: bb4af2ad47c592ddef5d5446eaf4e8fbfc6d3e5a30aa5469118e45caaa3d0d44
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
        app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
        component: standalone-collector
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/conf/relay.yaml
        command:
        - /otelcol-k8s
        env:
        - name: MY_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          value: 3276MiB
        image: otel/opentelemetry-collector-k8s:0.103.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 13133
        name: opentelemetry-collector
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6831
          name: jaeger-compact
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 14250
          name: jaeger-grpc
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 14268
          name: jaeger-thrift
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 4317
          name: otlp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 4318
          name: otlp-http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9411
          name: zipkin
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 13133
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2
            memory: 4Gi
        securityContext: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /conf
          name: opentelemetry-collector-configmap
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: example-opentelemetry-collector
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: relay
            path: relay.yaml
          name: example-opentelemetry-collector
        name: opentelemetry-collector-configmap

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.103.1
    helm.sh/chart: opentelemetry-collector-0.95.0
  name: example-opentelemetry-collector
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10

    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
      app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
      component: standalone-collector
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        checksum/config: 01ba4719c80b6fe911b091a7c05124b64eeece964e09c058ef8f9805daca546b
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
        app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
        component: standalone-collector
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/conf/config.yaml
        command:
        - /otelcol-k8s
        env:
        - name: MY_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: GOMEMLIMIT
          value: 152MiB

        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 13133
        name: opentelemetry-collector
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6831
          name: jaeger-compact
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 14250
          name: jaeger-grpc
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 14268
          name: jaeger-thrift
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 4317
          name: otlp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 4318
          name: otlp-http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9411
          name: zipkin
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 13133
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200M
        securityContext: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /conf/config.yaml
          name: custom-otelcol-configmap
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: example-opentelemetry-collector
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: config
            path: config.yaml
          name: custom-otel-collector-config
        name: custom-otelcol-configmap

      app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
      app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector

    type: RollingUpdate

kind: Deployment

    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.103.1

  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10

    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
      app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector
      component: standalone-collector
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:

        checksum/config: bb4af2ad47c592ddef5d5446eaf4e8fbfc6d3e5a30aa5469118e45caaa3d0d44
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: example
        app.kubernetes.io/name: opentelemetry-collector

              apiVersion: v1

          value: 152MiB

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: dev
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MY_APP_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: myapp-secret
        - name: MY_APP_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: myapp-secret
        image: nginx:latest
        name: myapp-container

  namespace: default

  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:
      app: web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: mysql
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-user
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: test_db
        image: webapp/web-app:latest
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: test_db
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

##### FILE: deployment6827.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dwk-exercises/Deployment/logoutput-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: logoutput-dep
  namespace: dwk-exercises
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: logoutput
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: logoutput
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: logoutput-configmap
        image: hremonen/logoutput:4.01
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: logoutput
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/logs
          name: logoutput-vol
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/config
          name: config-volume
      - image: hremonen/logoutput-generator:3.02
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: logoutput-generator
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/logs
          name: logoutput-vol
      volumes:
      - name: logoutput-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logoutput-claim
      - configMap:
          name: logoutput-configmap
        name: config-volume

---

        value: arm64

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:11.1.0
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.3.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

    matchLabels:
      app: rabbitmq
  template:

        app: rabbitmq
    spec:

      - env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_ERLANG_COOKIE

        image: rabbitmq:3-management-alpine
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - rabbitmq-diagnostics
            - ping
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 30

        ports:
        - containerPort: 5672
        - containerPort: 15672

          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 1Gi

        - mountPath: /var/lib/rabbitmq
          name: rabbitmq-data
        - mountPath: /var/log/rabbitmq
          name: rabbitmq-log
      volumes:
      - name: rabbitmq-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: rabbitmq-data
      - name: rabbitmq-log
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: rabbitmq-log

        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64

##### FILE: deployment6844.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

        apiserver: "true"

      containers:
      - args:

        image: kube-sample-apiserver:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: wardle-server
      - image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.5.14
        name: etcd
      serviceAccountName: apiserver

##### FILE: deployment6851.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to giropops/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: giropops
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 64Mi

---

  namespace: default

    matchLabels:
      run: my-nginx

    metadata:
      labels:
        run: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: custom-nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

        - mountPath: /prodapplication2
          name: myebsvolume2
      volumes:
      - name: myebsvolume2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: myebsvol-pv-claim2

##### FILE: deployment6857.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo 'Hello from BusyBox!'; sleep 10; done
        image: busybox
        name: myapp-container
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: special
        operator: Equal
        value: "true"

---

kind: Deployment

    app: postgres
  name: postgres-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: db-secrets
        - name: POSTGRES_USRENAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: db-config
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/sample-spring-boot-on-kubernetes-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sample-spring-boot-on-kubernetes-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sample-spring-boot-on-kubernetes
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sample-spring-boot-on-kubernetes
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-user
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_URL
          value: mongodb
        image: piomin/sample-spring-boot-on-kubernetes
        name: sample-spring-boot-on-kubernetes
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to giropops/Deployment/deployment-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: deployment-nginx
  name: deployment-nginx
  namespace: giropops
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: deployment-nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: deployment-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.18
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.3"
            memory: 128Mi

---

kind: Deployment

  name: haproxy
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: haproxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: haproxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: haproxy:2.9-alpine
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: haproxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/etc/haproxy
          name: haproxy-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: haproxy-config
        name: haproxy-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to bluesky/Deployment/bluesky-pds:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: bluesky-pds
  name: bluesky-pds
  namespace: bluesky
spec:
  replicas: 1
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: bluesky-pds
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PDS_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: adminPassword
              name: bluesky-secret
        - name: PDS_JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jwtSecret
              name: bluesky-secret
        - name: PDS_REPO_SIGNING_KEY_K256_PRIVATE_KEY_HEX
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: repoSigningKey
              name: bluesky-secret
        - name: PDS_PLC_ROTATION_KEY_K256_PRIVATE_KEY_HEX
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rotationKey
              name: bluesky-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: bluesky-cm
        image: ghcr.io/bluesky-social/pds:0.4
        name: bluesky-pds
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: pds
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /pds
          name: bluesky-pds-datadir
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: bluesky-pds-datadir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: bluesky-pds

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cs2-server
  name: cs2-server
  namespace: cs2-server
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cs2-server
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cs2-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CS2_PW
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: serverPassword
              name: cs2-server-secrets
        - name: CS2_RCONPW
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rconPassword
              name: cs2-server-secrets
        - name: SRCDS_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: srcdsToken
              name: cs2-server-secrets
        - name: TV_PW
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: tvPassword
              name: cs2-server-secrets
        - name: TV_RELAY_PW
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: tvRelayPassword
              name: cs2-server-secrets
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: cs2-cm
        image: monroeshindelar/cs2-server
        name: cs2-dedicated
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27015
          name: server
        - containerPort: 27015
          name: server-udp
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: tv
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 27016
          protocol: UDP
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 6Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/steam/cs2-dedicated/
          name: cs2-server-datadir
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: cs2-server-datadir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs2-server

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: rust-server
  name: rust-server
  namespace: rust-server
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rust-server
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rust-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rust-cm
        - secretRef:
            name: rust-server-secret
        image: didstopia/rust-server
        name: rust-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 28015
          name: server
        - containerPort: 28015
          name: server-udp
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 28016
          name: rcon
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 6Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /steamcmd/rust
          name: rust-server-datadir
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: rust-server-datadir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: rust-server

          value: Asia/Shanghai

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 5

            port: 8085
          timeoutSeconds: 5

          name: http
          protocol: TCP

          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: afuim8Sh
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: bitbucket
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: bitbucket
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: afuim8Sh
        image: mysql:5.7
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: tcp
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-vol
          subPath: mysql-vol
        - mountPath: /etc/mysql/mysql.conf.d/mysqld.cnf
          name: mysql
          subPath: mysqld.cnf
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: atlassian
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: mysql
        name: mysql

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fisheye:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fisheye
  name: fisheye
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fisheye
  strategy:
    type: Recreate

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fisheye
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: gitlab
  name: gitlab
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gitlab
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gitlab
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        - name: GITLAB_TIMEZONE
          value: Beijing
        - name: GITLAB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG
          value: external_url 'http://gitlab.devops.local'
        image: gitlab/gitlab-ce:15.10.1-ce.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: gitlab
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: tcp
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/gitlab
          name: gitlab-vol
          subPath: gitlab-vol/config
        - mountPath: /var/log/gitlab
          name: gitlab-vol
          subPath: gitlab-vol/logs
        - mountPath: /var/opt/gitlab
          name: gitlab-vol
          subPath: gitlab-vol/data
      hostname: git
      setHostnameAsFQDN: true
      volumes:
      - name: gitlab-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: infra

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: grafana
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        image: grafana/grafana:10.4.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-vol
      volumes:
      - name: grafana-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana-vol

        app: mariadb
    spec:
      containers:

          value: Asia/Shanghai
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: aiwu7af1uX
        image: mariadb:10.7.3-focal
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: tcp
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mariadb-vol
          subPath: mariadb-vol
        - mountPath: /etc/mysql/conf.d/mysqld.cnf
          name: mariadb
          subPath: mysqld.cnf
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - name: mariadb-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: epub-dev
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: mariadb
        name: mariadb

      app: minio

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minio

      containers:

        - /bin/sh
        - -ce
        - /usr/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh minio server --json /data
        env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          value: uig8ooMoqu6feek7Eefo
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: iekuenaa5uWaiqu9apeenaichieh6ahm6eilahfa
        image: minio/minio:RELEASE.2021-03-12T00-00-47Z
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9000
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: tcp
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9000
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi

        - mountPath: /data
          name: minio-vol
          subPath: minio-vol

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prometheus:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus
  name: prometheus
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: prometheus
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        image: prom/prometheus:v2.51.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9090
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9090
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /prometheus
          name: prometheus-vol
          subPath: prometheus-vol
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
          name: prometheus
          subPath: prometheus.yml
      serviceAccount: prometheus
      serviceAccountName: prometheus
      volumes:
      - name: prometheus-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: prometheus-vol
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus
        name: prometheus

---

kind: Deployment

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: sonarqube
  strategy:

      labels:
        app: sonarqube
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        - name: SONAR_JDBC_URL
          value: jdbc:postgresql://postgresql:5432/sonar
        - name: SONAR_JDBC_USERNAME
          value: sonar
        - name: SONAR_JDBC_PASSWORD
          value: sonar
        image: sonarqube:9.9.0-community
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9000
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: sonarqube
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: tcp
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9000
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/sonarqube/data
          name: sonarqube-vol
          subPath: sonarqube-vol/data
        - mountPath: /opt/sonarqube/extensions
          name: sonarqube-vol
          subPath: sonarqube-vol/extensions
        - mountPath: /opt/sonarqube/logs
          name: sonarqube-vol
          subPath: sonarqube-vol/logs
      volumes:
      - name: sonarqube-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ruoyi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: cloudy-demo
  namespace: demo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cloudy-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cloudy-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - python
        - -m
        - http.server
        - "8080"
        - --directory
        - /html
        image: python:3.9-slim
        name: cloudy-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /html
          name: html
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: index.html
            path: index.html
          name: cloudy-demo-html
        name: html

##### FILE: deployment6905.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: api-config
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: api-config
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: db-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        image: anujais2017/ecom-api-service:1.0.20
        name: api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

        app: studentapp

      - image: nginx

        name: tomcat-container

##### FILE: deployment6915.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --enable-leader-election
        command:
        - /manager
        image: ghcr.io/doodlescheduling/swagger-hub-controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: probes
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: swagger-hub-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9556
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9557
          name: probes
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: probes
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/controller

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: mysql

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:8.3.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

##### FILE: deployment6938.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/splitted-logoutput:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: splitted-logoutput
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: logoutput
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: logoutput
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sushashu/logoutput-writer:1.10
        name: logoutput-writer
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files
          name: shared-log
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        image: sushashu/logoutput-reader:1.10
        name: logoutput-reader
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files
          name: shared-log
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared-log

---

##### FILE: deployment694.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dashboard
  name: pl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLables:
      app: dashboard
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dashboard
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sysnet4admin/dashboard
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dashboard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /log
          name: log-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: dashboard-configmap
        name: config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log-volume

---

##### FILE: deployment6946.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to logoutput-pingpong/Deployment/splitted-logoutput:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: splitted-logoutput
  namespace: logoutput-pingpong
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: logoutput
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: logoutput
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sushashu/logoutput-writer:1.10
        name: logoutput-writer
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files
          name: shared-log-pong
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: MSG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MESSAGE
              name: example-configmap
        image: sushashu/logoutput-reader:2.06
        name: logoutput-reader
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files
          name: shared-log-pong
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/fromconfigmap
          name: config-test
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: information.txt
            path: information.txt
          name: example-configmap
        name: config-test
      - name: shared-log-pong
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: image-claim

---

      app: hello-world

      labels:

        ports:

            memory: 32Mi

  replicas: 2

      app: story
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: story

      - env:
