          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: folder
              name: data-store-env
        image: two4onebill/kub-data-demo:2
        name: story
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/story
          name: story-volume
      volumes:
      - name: story-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: host-pvc

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    annotation-key1: annotation-value1
  labels:
    label-key1: label-value1
  name: deployment-name
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      label-key1: label-value1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        label-key1: label-value1
      name: pod-name
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: image-name
        name: container-name
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

kind: Deployment

    operator-deployment: kubernetes-operator
  name: operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      operator-deployment: kubernetes-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        operator-deployment: kubernetes-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: operator
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: operator
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

        app: story

        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/story

      volumes:

          path: /data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: story-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: hello
  name: hello
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo Hello from my container! && sleep 3600
        image: busybox
        name: hello-container

##### FILE: deployment699.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pi-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kubernetes.courselabs.co: troubleshooting
  name: pi-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pi-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pi-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - dotnet
        - Pi.Web.dll
        - -m
        - web
        image: kiamol/ch05-pi
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi

---

          name: spring-petclinic-storage

##### FILE: deployment6995.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exercises-namespace/Deployment/log-output-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: log-output-dep
  namespace: exercises-namespace
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: log-output
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: log-output
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "3002"
        - name: PINGS_URL
          value: http://pong-svc:80/pingpong
        - name: MESSAGE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: message
              name: log-output-configmap
        image: ktatu/log-output-reader:2.11
        name: log-output-reader
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files/timestamp
          name: shared-timestamp
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files/config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      - image: ktatu/log-output-generator:1.1
        name: log-output-generator
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files/timestamp
          name: shared-timestamp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared-timestamp
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: serverconfig.txt
            path: serverconfig.txt
          name: log-output-configmap
        name: config

---

      labels:
        app: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:

        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

            memory: 32Mi

##### FILE: deployment7_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/riv23-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: riv23-demo
  name: riv23-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: riv23-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: riv23-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /mnt/setup/init.sh
        env:
        - name: BUCKET_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: bucket-name
              name: pod-setup
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cluster-name
              name: pod-setup
        - name: POD_UID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.uid
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        image: public.ecr.aws/amazonlinux/amazonlinux:2023
        name: aws-cli
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: ".5"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/setup
          name: pod-setup
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /mnt/demo
          name: demo-scripts
          readOnly: false
      serviceAccount: riv23-demo
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: pod-setup
        name: pod-setup
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: demo-scripts
        name: demo-scripts

---

##### FILE: deployment70.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

        - donet
        - Pi.Web.dll
        - -m
        - web
        image: kiamol/ch05-pi-app

          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthy
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8020

            memory: 128Gi

##### FILE: deployment7016.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to team-red/Deployment/team-red-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: team-red-app
  namespace: team-red
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: team-red-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: team-red-app
        app.kubernetes.io/name: team-red-app
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.0.0
      name: team-red-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: team-red-cm
        image: mendhak/http-https-echo:29
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
        name: echoserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 2
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-sf
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.21.1-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf
          name: user-auth
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
        name: config
      - name: user-auth
        secret:
          items:
          - key: user1
            path: htpasswd
          secretName: auth-basic

  namespace: backend

  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: db-credentials
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_NAME
              name: db-credentials
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: db-credentials
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: db-credentials
        image: gcr.io/project897927/backend:latest
        name: backend-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: gcr-json-key

##### FILE: deployment703.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/python:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /secrets/
          name: secret-volume
        - mountPath: /configs/
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: mysecret
      - configMap:
          name: example-config
        name: config-volume

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: my-pacific-database
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_HOST
              name: mysql-config
        - name: DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-config
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        image: digitalhubprashant/node-api-image:latest
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to example-namespace/Deployment/example-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: example-deployment
  namespace: example-namespace
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo hello; sleep 10;done
        env:
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secret-key
              name: example-secret
        image: busybox
        name: example-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/config
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /mnt/efs
          name: efs-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: example-config
        name: config-volume
      - name: efs-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: efs-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:

      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate

    metadata:

        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/deno-app:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

            memory: 256Mi

            memory: 64Mi

    io.kompose.service: orbital-sync
  name: orbital-sync
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: orbital-sync
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.34.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: orbital-sync
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: INTERVAL_MINUTES
          value: "20"
        image: mattwebbio/orbital-sync:1
        name: orbital-sync
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/calibre-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: calibre-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: calibre-web
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: calibre-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: TZ
          value: Etc/UTC
        - name: DOCKER_MODS
          value: linuxserver/mods:universal-calibre
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/calibre-web:latest@sha256:978d38b0a03b5503630a8365047060e79d3304d8c336b9a23b1e87c4b15f8256
        name: calibre-web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8083
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: calibre-web-config
        - mountPath: /books
          name: calibre-web-books
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: calibre-web-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: calibre-web-config
      - name: calibre-web-books
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: calibre-web-books

---

          name: maintainerr-claim

      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prowlarr:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f compose.yaml
    kompose.version: 1.34.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: prowlarr
  name: prowlarr
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: prowlarr
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f compose.yaml
        kompose.version: 1.34.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: prowlarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: TZ
          value: Etc/UTC
        - name: UMASK
          value: "002"
        - name: VPN_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: VPN_PROVIDER
          value: pia
        - name: VPN_PIA_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: pia-creds
        - name: VPN_PIA_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: pia-creds
        - name: VPN_PIA_PREFERRED_REGION
          value: ca_toronto
        - name: VPN_LAN_NETWORK
          value: 192.168.2.0/24,192.168.1.0/24
        - name: VPN_CONF
          value: wg0
        - name: VPN_ADDITIONAL_PORTS
          value: 443/tcp
        image: ghcr.io/hotio/prowlarr:latest@sha256:41bae5abd4054b91a3ec71d017cbf278bf8b68de67185c40d4e894f5c6d88098
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 9696
        name: prowlarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9696
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: prowlarr-claim
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: prowlarr-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: prowlarr-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment7047.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/readarr:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: readarr
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: readarr
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: readarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGID
          value: "100"
        - name: PUID
          value: "99"
        - name: TZ
          value: Etc/UTC
        image: ghcr.io/hotio/readarr:latest@sha256:7c698fed42755d6e21b31c2b712cf01260666163d64775dd75d07c6892457415
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - ls
            - /data/
          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 7200
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: readarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8787
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: readarr-config
        - mountPath: /data
          name: readarr-media
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: readarr-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: readarr-config
      - name: readarr-media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: media-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment7050.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/user-microservice-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: user-microservice-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: user-microservice
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: user-microservice
      name: user-microservice
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: secrets-user-microservice
        image: $ECR_REPOSITORY
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /liveness
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: user-microservice-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2000Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-crud-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-crud-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-crud-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AWS_REGION
          value: sa-east-1
        - name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
              name: aws-secret
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
              name: aws-secret
        image: my-crud-app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: my-crud-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

        app: sparglim-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPARGLIM_SERVER_MODE
          value: k8s

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: SPARGLIM_DRIVER_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: SPARGLIM_SERVER_CUSTOM_CONFIG
          value: '{}'
        image: prodevonline/sparglim-server
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: sparglim-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 15002

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: external-dns

    matchLabels:
      app: wireguard

      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: wireguard
    spec:
      containers:

        - name: LOG_LEVEL
          value: info
        - name: TZ
          value: Europe/Ljubljana
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: wireguard-secret
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/wireguard:latest
        name: wireguard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 51820
          protocol: UDP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config/
          name: wireguard-config
      nodeName: control-plane-1
      restartPolicy: Always
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/data/wireguard-config
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: wireguard-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-webhook:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: example-webhook
  name: example-webhook
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-webhook
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-webhook
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/example-webhook:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: tls
        - containerPort: 80
          name: metrics
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/webhook/certs/
          name: webhook-tls-certs
          readOnly: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1234
      serviceAccountName: example-webhook
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-tls-certs
        secret:
          secretName: example-webhook-tls

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/application-cpu:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: application-cpu
  name: application-cpu
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: application-cpu
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: application-cpu
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/application-cpu:v1.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: application-cpu
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 50Mi

##### FILE: deployment7091.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/time-logger:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: time-logger
  name: time-logger
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: time-logger
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: time-logger
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          while true; do
            for x in $(seq 1200); do
              date >> /var/log/time.log
              sleep 1
            done
            truncate /var/log/time.log --size 0
          done
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        image: amazon/aws-cli
        name: aws-cli
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: var-log
      - args:
        - |
          tail -f /var/log/time.log
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        image: busybox
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: var-log
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: var-log
status: {}

---

##### FILE: deployment7092.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          value: admin
        image: grafana/grafana
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards
          name: grafana-config
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-dashboards
        name: grafana-config
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mikes-test-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mike-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mike-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: API_TOKEN
              name: my-secret
        image: docker-registry:5000/test-py:1.0.1
        name: mike-pod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/config
          name: mikes-configmap
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mikes-configmap
        name: mikes-configmap

---

kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default

    matchLabels:

  strategy:

      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/python:1.0.4
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

##### FILE: deployment711.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    fluxcd.io/automated: "true"
    fluxcd.io/tag.example-app: semver:~1.0
  labels:
    app: example-app
    test: test
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/python:1.0.4
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: cattle.io/os
        value: linux

---

##### FILE: deployment7116.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to standard/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres
  namespace: standard
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: postgres-secret
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-storage
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc

---

  namespace: default

        app: example-app-1

        name: example-app-1

        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /configs/
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: example-app-1
        name: config-volume

      app: ecommerce-platform
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ecommerce-platform
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: youracr.azurecr.io/ecommerce-platform:$(tag)
        name: ecommerce-platform
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: deployment715.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/nginx-ingress-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "10254"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        - --tcp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/tcp-services
        - --udp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/udp-services
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx
        - --annotations-prefix=nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.25.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 33
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/custom-snippets/
          name: custom-snippets
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress-serviceaccount
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: custom-snippets
        name: custom-snippets

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: deployment721_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/rabbitmq-publisher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: rabbitmq-publisher
  name: rabbitmq-publisher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rabbitmq-publisher
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rabbitmq-publisher
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RABBIT_HOST
          value: rabbitmq-0.rabbitmq.rabbits.svc.cluster.local
        - name: RABBIT_PORT
          value: "5672"
        - name: RABBIT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBIT_USERNAME
              name: rabbitmq-publisher
        - name: RABBIT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBIT_PASSWORD
              name: rabbitmq-publisher
        image: aimvector/rabbitmq-publisher:v1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: rabbitmq-publisher
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    k8s-app: kube-state-metrics
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.33.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.33.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --config-reloader-image=quay.io/coreos/configmap-reload:v0.0.1
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/coreos/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.33.0
        image: quay.io/coreos/prometheus-operator:v0.33.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kube-state-metrics
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kube-state-metrics
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:8443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8081/
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https-main
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:9443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8082/
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-self
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: https-self
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      - args:
        - --host=127.0.0.1
        - --port=8081
        - --telemetry-host=127.0.0.1
        - --telemetry-port=8082
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        name: kube-state-metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/nodejs:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/springjava:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    annotation-key1: annotation-value1
  labels:
    label-key1: label-value1
  name: deployment-name
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      label-key1: label-value1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        label-key1: label-value1
      name: pod-name
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: image-name
        name: container-name
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

##### FILE: deployment734.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

##### FILE: deployment737.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to wardle/Deployment/wardle-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    apiserver: "true"
  name: wardle-server
  namespace: wardle
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      apiserver: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        apiserver: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --etcd-servers=http://localhost:2379
        image: kube-sample-apiserver:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: wardle-server
      - image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.5.10
        name: etcd
      serviceAccountName: apiserver

---

##### FILE: deployment739.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fileshare:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fileshare
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fileshare
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fileshare
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: centosadmin/reloadable-nginx:1.12
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: config
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chmod 777 /data
        image: busybox
        name: mount-permissions-fix
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: fileshare
        name: config
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fileshare

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: deployment747.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

##### FILE: deployment752.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: arthur11/hello-go:v4.5
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 3
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/goserver

##### FILE: deployment757.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to goalsetter/Deployment/keycloak-postgresql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: keycloak
    component: database
  name: keycloak-postgresql
  namespace: goalsetter
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: keycloak
      component: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: keycloak
        component: database
      name: keycloak-postgresql
      namespace: goalsetter
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRESQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USERNAME
              name: keycloak-db-secret
        - name: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: keycloak-db-secret
        - name: POSTGRESQL_DATABASE
          value: root
        image: registry.access.redhat.com/rhscl/postgresql-10-rhel7:1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 5432
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: keycloak-postgresql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - psql -h 127.0.0.1 -U $POSTGRESQL_USER -q -d $POSTGRESQL_DATABASE -c
              'SELECT 1'
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources: {}
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/pgsql/data
          name: keycloak-postgresql-claim
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: keycloak-postgresql-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: keycloak-postgresql-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment759.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/cake-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: cake-app
  name: cake-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cake-app
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: cake-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: APP_BG
          value: gray
        image: kadasz/cake-app:1.0.9
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health/check
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
        name: cake-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health/check
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
          successThreshold: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 250Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 9999
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 9999

---

##### FILE: deployment770.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/identitymanager-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: identitymanager-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: identitymanager
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: identitymanager
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: localhost:5000/identitymanager:latest
        name: identitymanager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/mongo-user
          name: mongo-user
          subPath: mongo-user
        - mountPath: /usr/keys
          name: identitymanager-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-user
        secret:
          secretName: mongo-user
      - name: identitymanager-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: identitymanager-claim0

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  generation: 1
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: meu-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx
        port:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: Deployment777.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/alertmanager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: alertmanager
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alertmanager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: alertmanager
      name: alertmanager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/alertmanager/config.yml
        - --storage.path=/alertmanager
        image: prom/alertmanager:latest
        name: alertmanager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9093
          name: alertmanager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/alertmanager
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/alertmanager-templates
          name: templates-volume
        - mountPath: /alertmanager
          name: alertmanager
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: alertmanager-config
        name: config-volume
      - configMap:
          name: alertmanager-templates
        name: templates-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: alertmanager

---

##### FILE: deployment779.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: danielsdev/hello-go:v2.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: names
            path: names.txt
          name: goserver-names
        name: config

---

        app: alertmanager
      name: alertmanager

        name: alertmanager

          name: alertmanager

            memory: 500M

          name: config-volume

          name: alertmanager-config
        name: config-volume

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pongapi
  namespace: pingpong
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: pong
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: pong
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CACHE_TYPE
          value: redis
        - name: CACHE_HOST
          value: redis
        - name: CACHE_PORT
          value: "6379"
        image: kumsub/pong:v1
        name: pong
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8090
          name: tcp

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: nasi101/auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

##### FILE: deployment790.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange:0.0.1-RELEASE
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: deployment794_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
    tier: database
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: database
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ignore-db-dir=lost+found
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: root
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to synapse/Deployment/coturn:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: coturn
  namespace: synapse
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: coturn
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: coturn
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TURN_CONFIG
          value: /etc/coturn.conf
        - name: CHECK_INTERVAL
          value: "500"
        image: dexxter1911/dynamic-coturn:latest
        name: turn
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secret
          name: cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/coturn.conf
          name: conf
          subPath: coturn.conf
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - name: cert
        secret:
          secretName: turn.example.org
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: coturn.conf
            path: coturn.conf
          name: coturn-conf
        name: conf

---

  name: net-policy-deploy-api
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: np-api

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: np-api
        app-group: np-test
      name: np-api-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker-registry:5000/test-py:1.0.1
        name: mike-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
          name: flask-port

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: deployment818.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pi-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch16
  name: pi-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pi-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pi-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - dotnet
        - Pi.Web.dll
        - -m
        - web

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node-affinity-test:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: node-affinity-test
  name: node-affinity-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-affinity-test
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: node-affinity-test
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: size
                operator: In
                values:
                - Large
                - Medium
      containers:
      - image: docker-registry:5000/nginx
        name: nginx
        resources: {}
status: {}

---

##### FILE: deployment822.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flask
  name: flask
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 120
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: flask
      name: flask
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: flask
        image: localhost:5000/flask:__VERSION__
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /app/public/ready
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: flask
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /app/public/ready
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/public
          name: public-dir
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /app/public/ready
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /app/public/ready
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-config
        - mountPath: /app/public
          name: public-dir
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - build.sh
        command:
        - bash
        image: localhost:5000/flask:__VERSION__
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: npm
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/public
          name: public-dir
        workingDir: /app
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: flask-nginx
        name: nginx-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: public-dir

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: postgres-config
        image: postgres:11.7
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-storage
          subPath: postgres
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pgsql-pv-claim

##### FILE: deployment831.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mariadb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: mariadb
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mariadb
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        k8up.io/backupcommand: /bin/bash -c 'mysqldump -uroot -p"${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}"
          --all-databases'
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mariadb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mariadb-pass
        image: mariadb:10.4
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mariadb
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -i
            - -c
            - mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -uroot -p"${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}" -D mysql -e 'SELECT
              1'
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mariadb-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mariadb-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mariadb-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment832.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: minio
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minio
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - server
        - /data
        - --console-address=:9001
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: minio-credentials
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: minio-credentials
        image: minio/minio
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /minio/health/live
            port: 9000
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
        - containerPort: 9001
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /minio/health/ready
            port: 9000
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 20
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: minio-pvc

---

kind: Deployment

  name: hotel-api-deployment
  namespace: hotel-api
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hotel-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hotel-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_DB_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_DB_URL
              name: hotel-api-secrets
        - name: MONGO_DB_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_DB_NAME
              name: hotel-api-secrets
        - name: JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET
              name: hotel-api-secrets
        - name: HTTP_LISTEN_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: HTTP_LISTEN_ADDRESS
              name: hotel-api-secrets
        - name: MONGO_DB_URL_TEST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGO_DB_URL_TEST
              name: hotel-api-secrets
        image: docker.io/ndeta100/hotel-api:latest
        name: hotel-api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongodb/Deployment/mongo-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo-db
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-db
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongo-db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongodb-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongodb-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment842.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: wesleywillians/21-deploy-k8s:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 32Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 10

---

      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=ingress
        - --provider=coredns
        - --log-level=debug
        env:
        - name: ETCD_URLS
          value: https://172.19.1.100:2379
        - name: ETCD_CA_FILE
          value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd-ca/tls.crt
        - name: ETCD_CERT_FILE
          value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd-client/tls.crt
        - name: ETCD_KEY_FILE
          value: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd-client/tls.key
        image: registry.k8s.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.13.4
        name: external-dns
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd-ca
          name: etcd-ca-cert
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki/etcd-client
          name: etcd-client-cert
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeName: kubemaster
      serviceAccountName: external-dns
      volumes:
      - name: etcd-ca-cert
        secret:
          secretName: etcd-ca
      - name: etcd-client-cert
        secret:
          secretName: etcd-client-for-core-dns
