apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: traefik-ingress-traefik
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
    helm.sh/chart: traefik-34.3.0
  name: traefik
  namespace: ingress-traefik
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: traefik-ingress-traefik
      app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "9100"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: traefik-ingress-traefik
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
        helm.sh/chart: traefik-34.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --global.checknewversion
        - --global.sendanonymoususage
        - --entryPoints.metrics.address=:9100/tcp
        - --entryPoints.traefik.address=:9000/tcp
        - --entryPoints.web.address=:8080/tcp
        - --entryPoints.websecure.address=:8443/tcp
        - --api.dashboard=true
        - --api.insecure=true
        - --accesslog=true
        - --ping=true
        - --metrics.prometheus=true
        - --metrics.prometheus.entrypoint=metrics
        - --providers.kubernetescrd
        - --providers.kubernetescrd.ingressclass=traefik
        - --providers.kubernetescrd.allowEmptyServices=true
        - --providers.kubernetesingress
        - --providers.kubernetesingress.ingressclass=traefik
        - --providers.kubernetesingress.allowEmptyServices=true
        - --providers.kubernetesingress.ingressendpoint.publishedservice=ingress-traefik/traefik
        - --providers.kubernetesgateway
        - --providers.kubernetesgateway.statusaddress.service.name=traefik
        - --providers.kubernetesgateway.statusaddress.service.namespace=ingress-traefik
        - --entryPoints.websecure.http.tls=true
        - --serverstransport.insecureskipverify=true
        - --log.level=DEBUG
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: public.ecr.aws/docker/library/traefik:v3.3.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle: null
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 9000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: traefik
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: traefik
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: websecure
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 9000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources: null
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 65532
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65532
      serviceAccountName: traefik
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data
      - emptyDir: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/glance:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: glance
    app.kubernetes.io/name: glance
  name: glance
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: glance
      app.kubernetes.io/name: glance
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: glance
        app.kubernetes.io/name: glance
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /app/glance
        - -config
        - /config/glance.yml
        image: glance
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: glance
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          hostPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: glance-config
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ghcr-registry-cred
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: glance-config
        name: glance-config

---

##### FILE: deployment862.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/invoiceninja:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: invoiceninja
  name: invoiceninja
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: invoiceninja
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: invoiceninja
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: invoiceninja-env
        image: invoiceninja
        name: invoiceninja
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: backend
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public
          name: invoiceninja-shared
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: storage
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: public-storage
      - command:
        - sh
        - /usr/local/bin/cron.sh
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: invoiceninja-env
        image: invoiceninja
        name: cron
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/bin/cron.sh
          name: invoiceninja-cron-config
          subPath: cron.sh
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public
          name: invoiceninja-shared
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: storage
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: public-storage
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public
          name: invoiceninja-shared
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: storage
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: public-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: invoiceninja-nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1500:82 /var/www/app/public /var/www/app/storage
        image: busybox
        name: volume-mount-hack
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public
          name: invoiceninja-shared
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: storage
        - mountPath: /var/www/app/public/storage
          name: invoiceninja-storage
          subPath: public-storage
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: invoiceninja-shared
      - name: invoiceninja-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: invoiceninja-data-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: invoiceninja-cron-config
        name: invoiceninja-cron-config
      - configMap:
          name: invoiceninja-nginx-config
        name: invoiceninja-nginx-config

---

##### FILE: deployment864.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to media/Deployment/bazarr:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: bazarr
    app.kubernetes.io/name: bazarr
  name: bazarr
  namespace: media
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: bazarr
      app.kubernetes.io/name: bazarr
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: bazarr
        app.kubernetes.io/name: bazarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Chicago
        image: bazarr
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /usr/bin/env
            - bash
            - -c
            - curl --fail localhost:6767/v3/system/status?apiKey=`IFS=\> && while
              read -d \< E C; do if [[ $E = "ApiKey" ]]; then echo $C; fi; done <
              /config/config.xml`
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: bazarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6767
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config/config/config.ini
          name: config
          readOnly: false
          subPath: config.ini
        - mountPath: /media
          name: media
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.ini
            path: config.ini
          name: bazarr-config
        name: config
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: smb-media-claim

---

          name: desktop-gui

          successThreshold: 1

          timeoutSeconds: 1

          name: media

##### FILE: deployment866.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to media/Deployment/lidarr:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: lidarr
    app.kubernetes.io/name: lidarr
  name: lidarr
  namespace: media
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: lidarr
      app.kubernetes.io/name: lidarr
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: lidarr
        app.kubernetes.io/name: lidarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Chicago
        image: lidarr
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /usr/bin/env
            - bash
            - -c
            - curl --fail localhost:8686/v3/system/status?apiKey=`IFS=\> && while
              read -d \< E C; do if [[ $E = "ApiKey" ]]; then echo $C; fi; done <
              /config/config.xml`
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: lidarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8686
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config-empty
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /media
          name: media
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - ' echo ''Setting configmap''  && cp /tmp/config/config.xml /etc/config/config.xml
          && chmod 777 /etc/config/config.xml'
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        image: busybox:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: setup-config
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/config
          name: config
        - mountPath: /etc/config
          name: config-empty
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.xml
            path: config.xml
          name: lidarr-config
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config-empty
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: smb-media-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment867.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to media/Deployment/prowlarr:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: prowlarr
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prowlarr
  name: prowlarr
  namespace: media
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: prowlarr
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prowlarr
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: prowlarr
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prowlarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Chicago
        image: prowlarr
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: prowlarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9696
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config/config.xml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: config.xml
        - mountPath: /media
          name: media
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.xml
            path: config.xml
          name: prowlarr-config
        name: config
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: smb-media-claim

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to media/Deployment/radarr:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: radarr
    app.kubernetes.io/name: radarr
  name: radarr
  namespace: media
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: radarr
      app.kubernetes.io/name: radarr
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: radarr
        app.kubernetes.io/name: radarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Chicago
        image: radarr
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /usr/bin/env
            - bash
            - -c
            - curl --fail localhost:7878/api/v3/system/status?apiKey=`IFS=\> && while
              read -d \< E C; do if [[ $E = "ApiKey" ]]; then echo $C; fi; done <
              /config/config.xml`
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: radarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7878
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config/config.xml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: config.xml
        - mountPath: /media
          name: media
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.xml
            path: config.xml
          name: radarr-config
        name: config
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: smb-media-claim

---

kind: Deployment

    app: secret-deployment

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: secret-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: secret-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: my-secret
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: my-secret
              name: mikes-secret
        image: docker-registry:5000/secret-server
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: secret-server

##### FILE: deployment871.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to media/Deployment/sabnzbd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: sabnzbd
    app.kubernetes.io/name: sabnzbd
  name: sabnzbd
  namespace: media
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: sabnzbd
      app.kubernetes.io/name: sabnzbd
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: sabnzbd
        app.kubernetes.io/name: sabnzbd
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Chicago
        - name: PGID
          value: "100"
        - name: PUID
          value: "1026"
        image: sabnzbd
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: sabnzbd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config-empty
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /media
          name: media
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - ' echo ''Setting configmap''  && cp /tmp/config/sabnzbd.ini /etc/config/sabnzbd.ini
          && chmod 777 /etc/config/sabnzbd.ini'
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        image: busybox:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: setup-config
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/config
          name: config
        - mountPath: /etc/config
          name: config-empty
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: sabnzbd.ini
            path: sabnzbd.ini
          name: sabnzbd-config
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: config-empty
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: smb-media-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment873.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pmcd-dev:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: pmcd-dev
    app.kubernetes.io/name: pmcd-dev
  name: pmcd-dev
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: pmcd-dev
      app.kubernetes.io/name: pmcd-dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: pmcd-dev
        app.kubernetes.io/name: pmcd-dev
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: pmcd-dev
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: pmcd-dev
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          hostPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File

      - name: ghcr-registry-cred
      restartPolicy: Always

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/cloudflared:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: cloudflared
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cloudflared
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cloudflared
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - tunnel
        - --config
        - /etc/cloudflared/config/config.yaml
        - --protocol
        - http2
        - run
        image: cloudflare/cloudflared:2024.1.5
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 2000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: cloudflared
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cloudflared/config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/cloudflared/creds
          name: creds
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: creds
        secret:
          secretName: tunnel-credentials
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.yaml
            path: config.yaml
          name: cloudflared
        name: config

        app.kubernetes.io/name: mysql-paopao

      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: paopao
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: paopao
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: paopao

          value: "yes"

        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mysql-paopao

          name: mysql-port
          protocol: TCP

        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/paopao.sql
          name: sql-script
          subPath: paopao.sql

      serviceAccountName: mysql-paopao

          - key: paopao-mysql.sql
            path: paopao.sql

        name: sql-script

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/benk-placeholder:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: benk
  name: benk-placeholder
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: benk-placeholder
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: benk
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: benk
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: csi.hpe.com/hpe-nfs
                operator: NotIn
                values:
                - "true"
      containers:
      - args:
        - --server
        command:
        - fio
        image: benk-placeholder
        name: benk
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8765

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fintech-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fintech-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fintech-web
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "5000"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
        prometheus.io/scrape-kube: "true"
      labels:
        app: fintech-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: USE_AWS_RDS
          value: "true"
        - name: FLASK_ENV
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: flask_env
              name: fintech-app-config
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secret_key
              name: fintech-secret
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: fintech-db-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: fintech-db-secret
        - name: DB_ENDPOINT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db_endpoint
              name: fintech-db-config
        - name: DATABASE_URI
          value: postgresql://$(DB_USERNAME):$(DB_PASSWORD)@$(DB_ENDPOINT)/fintech
        image: bobocuillere/fintech:latest
        name: fintech-web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment894.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ailab:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ailab
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ailab
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: ailab
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - ailab
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/ai-cfia-ia-acia.github.io:main
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: ailab
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1.5Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.cache
          name: cache-volume
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsGroup: 3000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-volume

---

  revisionHistoryLimit: 3

    matchLabels:

      labels:
        app: litellm
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - litellm
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - /app/config.yaml
        env:
        - name: LITELLM_MASTER_KEY
          value: sk-1234567
        image: ghcr.io/berriai/litellm:main-latest
        name: litellm
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config.yaml
          name: config-volume
          subPath: config.yaml
      securityContext:
        allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        capabilities:
          drop:
          - ALL
        fsGroup: 2000
        readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        runAsGroup: 3000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: litellm-config-file
        name: config-volume

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/gatus:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: gatus
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gatus
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gatus
      name: gatus
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL
              name: gatus-secret
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/gatus:master
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
        name: gatus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 100M
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 30M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: gatus-config
        - mountPath: /data
          name: gatus-db
      serviceAccountName: gatus
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: gatus
        name: gatus-config
      - name: gatus-db
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: gatus

---

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: phoenix

      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "9090"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"

        app: phoenix

      containers:
      - args:
        - -m
        - phoenix.server.main
        - serve
        command:
        - python
        env:
        - name: PHOENIX_WORKING_DIR
          value: /mnt/data
        - name: PHOENIX_PORT
          value: "6006"
        - name: PHOENIX_ENABLE_PROMETHEUS
          value: "true"
        - name: PHOENIX_SQL_DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: pgurl
              name: phoenix-app
        image: arizephoenix/phoenix:version-7.0.1
        name: phoenix
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6006
        - containerPort: 9090
        - containerPort: 4317
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            port: 6006
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/data
          name: phoenix
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: phoenix
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 8Gi

##### FILE: deployment9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to synapse/Deployment/delegation-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: delegation-nginx
  namespace: synapse
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: delegation-nginx
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: delegation-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: conf
          subPath: default.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: default.conf
            path: default.conf
          name: delegation-conf
        name: conf

---

##### FILE: deployment91.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.3.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

kind: Deployment

    app: promtail
    rol: monitoring
  name: promtail-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: promtail-pod
      rol: monitoring
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: promtail-pod
        rol: monitoring
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - promtail
        - --config.file=/etc/promtail/promtail-config.yaml
        image: grafana/promtail:2.9.0
        name: promtail-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/promtail/
          name: promtail-config
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx

        name: promtail-config
      - name: nginx-logs

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jenkins:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: jenkins
  name: jenkins
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jenkins
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jenkins
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/jenkins/jenkins:lts-jdk11
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: jenkins
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: httpport
        - containerPort: 50000
          name: jnlpport
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: jenkins-admin

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jenkins
  namespace: devops-tools
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jenkins-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jenkins-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jenkins/jenkins:lts
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: jenkins
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: httpport
        - containerPort: 50000
          name: jnlpport
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/jenkins_home
          name: jenkins-data
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: jenkins-admin
      volumes:
      - name: jenkins-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jenkins-pv-claim

##### FILE: deployment922.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/redis-cache:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis-cache
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-cache
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis-cache
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: redis:6.2.6-alpine
        name: redis-cache
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: config-volume
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - redis-cli flushall && echo 'Cache initialized'
        image: redis:6.2.6-alpine
        name: initialize-redis
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - cat /data/data.json | jq -r '.[]' | xargs -I {} redis-cli SET {} {}
        image: busybox:latest
        name: preheat-cache
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: data.json
            path: data.json
          name: redis-cache-data
        name: config-volume

---

kind: Deployment

    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:

      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.25
        livelinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          initalDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initalDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 3
          sucessThreshold: 1
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          initalDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: spring-k8s-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: spring-k8s-example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: spring-k8s-example
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aadimanchekar/spring-k8s-example:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: spring-k8s-example
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /hello
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dockerhub-credentials

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-user
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-password
              name: postgres-secret
        image: postgres:16
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432

##### FILE: deployment929.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-monitoring-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-monitoring-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-monitoring
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-monitoring
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.25
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - image: prom/prometheus
        name: monitoring-sidecar
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
          name: prometheus-config
          subPath: prometheus.yml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: prometheus.yml
            path: prometheus.yml
          name: prometheus-config
        name: prometheus-config

---

##### FILE: deployment930.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/emptydir-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: empty-dir-deployment
  name: emptydir-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: empty-dir-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: empty-dir-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - date >> /cache/date.txt; sleep 25
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: busybox:1.36
        name: container-1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cache
          name: cache-volume
      - args:
        - cat /cache/date.txt; sleep 25
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        image: busybox:1.36
        name: container-2
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cache
          name: cache-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/emptydir-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: deployment931.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

    matchLabels:

        image: kubernetesdemo:0.0.3

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rollapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: app
        version: 1.0.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ahmedgabercod/rollapp:1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: application
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1

##### FILE: deployment961.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - general
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.23.4
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi

---

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: story
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: story
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: STORY_FOLDER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: folder
              name: data-store-env
        image: jayasanka/k8-stories:v2
        name: story
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/story
          name: story-volume
      volumes:
      - name: story-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: host-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment969.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus
  name: prometheus
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9090"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: prometheus
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --storage.tsdb.retention=6h
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
        image: prom/prometheus
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: web
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus
          name: prometheus-config-volume
        - mountPath: /prometheus
          name: prometheus-storage-volume
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: prometheus-config
        name: prometheus-config-volume
      - name: prometheus-storage-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-data

---

##### FILE: deployment971.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: wordpress
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: wordpress
        name: wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: wordpress
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: wordpress-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: wordpress-persistent-storage

---

##### FILE: deployment972.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/javaserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: javaserver
  name: javaserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: javaserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: javaserver
      name: javaserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: javaserver-env
        image: viniciuscfn/praticando_kubernete:producao
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: javaserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 250Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 200Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: src/main/resources/arquivo/
          name: config
        - mountPath: src/main/resources/pvc
          name: javaserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: javaserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: javaserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: mensagem
            path: mensagem.txt
          name: configmap-arquivos
        name: config

---

##### FILE: deployment974.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to development/Deployment/pod-info-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-info
  name: pod-info-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-info
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-info
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: kimschles/pod-info-app:latest

        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

        app: goserver

        image: lucassalicano/hello-go:latest

            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: goserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 3

          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:

          periodSeconds: 3

##### FILE: deployment979.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/assets:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
    app.kubernetes.io/type: app
  name: assets
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: service
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: assets
      app.kubernetes.io/name: assets
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: service
        app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: assets
        app.kubernetes.io/name: assets
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: assets
        image: public.ecr.aws/aws-containers/retail-store-sample-assets:0.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health.html
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: assets
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 128m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: assets
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: tmp-volume

---

##### FILE: deployment980.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/carts:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
    app.kubernetes.io/type: app
  name: carts
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: service
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: carts
      app.kubernetes.io/name: carts
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /actuator/prometheus
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: service
        app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: carts
        app.kubernetes.io/name: carts
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JAVA_OPTS
          value: -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=75.0 -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/urandom
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: dynamodb
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: carts
        image: public.ecr.aws/aws-containers/retail-store-sample-cart:0.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 45
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: carts
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      serviceAccountName: carts
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: tmp-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/catalog:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
    app.kubernetes.io/type: app
  name: catalog
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: service
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: catalog
      app.kubernetes.io/name: catalog
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: service
        app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: catalog
        app.kubernetes.io/name: catalog
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: catalog-db
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: catalog-db
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: catalog
        image: public.ecr.aws/aws-containers/retail-store-sample-catalog:0.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: catalog
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      serviceAccountName: catalog
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: tmp-volume

---

      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JAVA_OPTS
          value: -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=75.0 -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/urandom
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_WRITER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: url
              name: orders-db
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_WRITER_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: orders-db
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_WRITER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: orders-db
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_READER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: url
              name: orders-db
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_READER_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: orders-db
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_READER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: orders-db
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: orders
        image: public.ecr.aws/aws-containers/retail-store-sample-orders:0.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 45
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: orders
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      serviceAccountName: orders
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: tmp-volume

---

##### FILE: deployment984.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ui:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
    app.kubernetes.io/type: app
  name: ui
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: service
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ui
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ui
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /actuator/prometheus
        prometheus.io/port: "8080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: service
        app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eks-workshop
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ui
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ui
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JAVA_OPTS
          value: -XX:MaxRAMPercentage=75.0 -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/urandom
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: ui
        image: public.ecr.aws/aws-containers/retail-store-sample-ui:0.4.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 45
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: ui
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1.5Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1.5Gi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-volume
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      serviceAccountName: ui
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: tmp-volume

---

              key: password
              name: mysql-secret

##### FILE: deploymentbd.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backend/Deployment/database:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: database
  name: database
  namespace: backend
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: database
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
        tier: backend
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: tier
                operator: In
                values:
                - back
      containers:
      - image: jlaredo/formacion-postgresql-amd64
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 5432
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: dbserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
          tcpSocket:
            port: 5432
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: datafiles
      volumes:
      - name: datafiles
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dbvolume-pvc

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: challenge
  name: challenge
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      os: ubuntu
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        os: ubuntu
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ubuntu:latest
        name: ubuntu-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: db-deployment
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: db-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: db-secrets-api
              optional: false
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: db-secrets-api
              optional: false
        image: mariadb:latest
        name: db-deployment-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mariadb-data
      volumes:
      - name: mariadb-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mariadb-data-claim

---

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: application-controller
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-root-password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
